featured.text: Very few people, no matter how intelligent or experienced, can 28 all the possibilities or outcomes of a policy or a course of action within just a short period of time.
On the basis of the clues, can you predict the of the story? (A) outcome (B) headline (C) cause (D) performance 5.
All three _____ seem confident that they will be elected, but we won’t know until the outcome of the election is announced.

definition.en_def: The result or effect of an action, situation, or event.
definition.example: The outcome of the experiment was surprising.
